msg.msgText: The server encountered a problem as it started and is unable to start messaging. Error={0} RC={1}.

msgExplanation.p: The server encountered a problem while attempting to recover its previous state during startup.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the return code (and any earlier log messages) to help diagnose the problem cause and determine appropriate action. One or more of the following actions may be appropriate:
i) Changing the setting Server.TolerateRecoveryInconsistencies to true will attempt to recover as much data as possible though some data loss may occur
ii) Performing a clean store operation to wipe the persistent data store
iii) Contact an IBM service representative
